option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/background_light" android:fillViewport="true" android:scrollbars="none" android:overScrollMode="never">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Header with Search and Cart --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/primary" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:paddingTop="16dp" android:paddingBottom="10dp" android:elevation="4dp">
<!-- Top Bar --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<!-- Logo/Brand --> <TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Natraj Super" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="22sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" />
<!-- Search Icon --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/search_icon" android:layout_width="30dp" android:layout_height="30dp" android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/margin_medium" android:src="@drawable/ic_search" android:tint="@color/white" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:padding="4dp" />
<!-- Cart Icon with Badge --> <FrameLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/cart_icon" android:layout_width="28dp" android:layout_height="28dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_cart" android:tint="@color/white" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:padding="4dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/cart_badge" android:layout_width="13dp" android:layout_height="13dp" android:layout_gravity="top|end" android:background="@drawable/bg_discount" android:gravity="center" android:text="3" android:textColor="@color/discount_text" android:textSize="10sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </FrameLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Categories Tagline --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="5dp" android:text="Premium Agricultural Equipment" android:textColor="@color/accent_yellow" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingVertical="4dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Search Bar --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="2dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/background_card">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:padding="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_search" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/category_search_bar" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:hint="Search categories..." android:textSize="15sp" android:textColorHint="@color/text_hint" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:padding="0dp" android:imeOptions="actionSearch" android:inputType="text" android:maxLines="1" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/voice_search_icon" android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_btn_speak_now" android:tint="@color/text_secondary" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Festival Special Offers Section -->
<!-- Categories Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="@dimen/padding_medium" android:background="@color/background_card" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_small">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical"> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Categories Grid --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/categories_grid_recycler" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_medium" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingHorizontal="@dimen/padding_small" android:nestedScrollingEnabled="false" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Footer Space --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="80dp" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/background_light" android:fillViewport="true" android:scrollbars="none" android:overScrollMode="never">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Header with Search and Cart --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/primary" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:paddingTop="16dp" android:paddingBottom="10dp" android:elevation="4dp">
<!-- Top Bar --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<!-- Logo/Brand --> <TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Natraj Super" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="22sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" />
<!-- Search Icon --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/search_icon" android:layout_width="30dp" android:layout_height="30dp" android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/margin_medium" android:src="@drawable/ic_search" android:tint="@color/white" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:padding="4dp" />
<!-- Cart Icon with Badge --> <FrameLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/cart_icon" android:layout_width="28dp" android:layout_height="28dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_cart" android:tint="@color/white" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:padding="4dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/cart_badge" android:layout_width="13dp" android:layout_height="13dp" android:layout_gravity="top|end" android:background="@drawable/bg_discount" android:gravity="center" android:text="3" android:textColor="@color/discount_text" android:textSize="10sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </FrameLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Categories Tagline --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="5dp" android:text="Premium Agricultural Equipment" android:textColor="@color/accent_yellow" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingVertical="4dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Search Bar --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="2dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/background_card">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:padding="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_search" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/category_search_bar" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:hint="Search categories..." android:textSize="15sp" android:textColorHint="@color/text_hint" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:padding="0dp" android:imeOptions="actionSearch" android:inputType="text" android:maxLines="1" />
<ImageView android:id="@+id/voice_search_icon" android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_btn_speak_now" android:tint="@color/text_secondary" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Festival Special Offers Section -->
<!-- Categories Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="@dimen/padding_medium" android:background="@color/background_card" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_small">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical"> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Categories Grid --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/categories_grid_recycler" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_medium" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingHorizontal="@dimen/padding_small" android:nestedScrollingEnabled="false" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Footer Space --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="80dp" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView>
